paste.title: Paste your text
paste.content: Start by pasting or typing your text into the editor. Don't paiseh, just dump in lah!

lock.title: Lock the document
lock.content: Press K or click the lock button to switch to annotation mode. Steady lah, now can mark up!

annotate.title: Annotate your text
annotate.content: Select text to highlight (H), comment (C), underline (U), or draw arrows (A). Wah so many tools, power sia!

eraser.title: Erase annotations
eraser.content: Press E or click the eraser to remove highlights, underlines, and arrows. Siao liao, wrong annotation? No worries, just erase!

unlock.title: Unlock to edit
unlock.content: Press K again to go back to editing. Your annotations all safe one, don't worry!

statusBar.title: Status bar
statusBar.content: Keep an eye on this bar â€” it tell you what happening one. Like your kaypoh friend, always got update.

share.title: Jio your friends
share.content: Generate a read-only or editable link to share your annotated document. The more the merrier lah!
